attributes.title: AWFUL!
attributes.review: Don’t get me wrong I absolutely love our president but this app is absolute crap! The icon kept disappearing off of my home page and whenever I tried to use the app it would glitch really badly! Not to mention the app kept coming on even when I was trying to use another app like youtube or something. This is a waste of time and space! If i could give this app a negative number I would!
